channel.title: CVE Feed for molongui -- Author Box, Guest Author and Co-Authors for Your Posts – Molongui
channel.description: The latest CVEs for molongui -- Author Box, Guest Author and Co-Authors for Your Posts – Molongui

item.title: CVE-2023-39921|2024-08-02T18:18:10.096Z -- molongui -- author%20box%2C%20guest%20author%20and%20co-authors%20for%20your%20posts%20%E2%80%93%20molongui
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Molongui Author Box, Guest Author and Co-Authors for Your Posts – Molongui allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Author Box, Guest Author and Co-Authors for Your Posts – Molongui: from n/a through 4.6.19.

item.title: CVE-2023-7014|2024-02-05T21:21:44.351Z -- molongui -- author%20box%2C%20guest%20author%20and%20co-authors%20for%20your%20posts%20%E2%80%93%20molongui
item.description: The Author Box, Guest Author and Co-Authors for Your Posts – Molongui plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 4.7.4 via the 'ma_debu' parameter. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including post author emails and names if applicable.

item.title: CVE-2023-7014|2024-08-02T08:50:07.710Z -- molongui -- author%20box%2C%20guest%20author%20and%20co-authors%20for%20your%20posts%20%E2%80%93%20molongui
item.description: The Author Box, Guest Author and Co-Authors for Your Posts – Molongui plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 4.7.4 via the 'ma_debu' parameter. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including post author emails and names if applicable.
